sections.text: prAṇO rakṣati̍ viśvamEjat|iryO̍# BUtvA bahudhA̍ bahUni|sa̍ ithsarvaM ~MvyAnaśE||yO̍ dEvO dEvEṣu# viBUrantaḥ|AvRudUdAt̍ kṣEtriyaddhvagadvRuṣA̱|tamit̍ prAṇaM manasO paśikṣata|agra̍M̍ dEvAnA-midama̍ttu̍ nO haviḥ||manasaścittEdam|BUtaM̍ BavyaM̍ ca gupyatE|taddhi dEvEṣvagriyam||1̍ (10)

A na# Etu puraścaram|saha dEvairimaṃ hava̱m|manaḥ śrEyasi̍ śrEyasi|karman.̍ yajñapatiM̍ dadhat||juṣatA̱M̍ mE vAgidaṃ haviḥ|virAḍdEvI purOhitA|havyavAḍana̍# pAyinI||yayA# rUpAṇi# bahudhA vadanti|pEśAṃ̍si̍ dEvAḥ paramE̍ janitrE̱|sAnO# virAḍanapasPurantI|2̍ (10)

vAgdEvI juṣatAmidaṃ̍ haviḥ||cakṣur̍ dEvAnAM jyOtiramRutE̍ nyaktam|asya̍ vijñAnAya̍ bahudhA nidhIyatE|tasya̍# sumna-maśImahi|mA̍ nO# hAsId-vicakṣaṇam||Ayurinnaḥ pratI̱ryatAm|anandhA-ścakṣu̍ṣA̍ vayam|jIvA jyOtiraśImahi|suvarjyOti̍-rutAmRuta̱m||śrOtrE̍ṇa̍ Badra muta śRuṇvanti̍ satyam ( )|śrOtrEṇa̍ vAcaM̍ bahudhOdya mAnAm|śrOtrE̍ṇa̍ mOdaśca̍ mahaśca̍ śrUyatE|śrOtrEṇa̍ sarvA diśa AśRuṇOmi||yEna̍ prAcyA# uta dakṣiṇA|pratIcyai̍# diśaḥ śRuṇvantyuttarAt|tadicCrOtra̍M̍ bahudhOdyamAnam|arAnna̍ nEmiḥ pari sarvaM̍ baBUva||3 (17) (agri - yamanapasPurantI̍ - satyaṃ sapta ca)̍ (A1) 2.5.2 upahOmAḥ

udEhi# vAjinyO asyaPsva̍ntaḥ|idaṃ̍ rAṣṭramAviśa̍ sUnRutAvat|yO̍ rOhitO̍ viśvamidaM̍ jajAna|sa̍ nO# rAṣṭrEṣu sudhitAndadhAtu||rOhaṃ̍# rOhaṃq rOhita̍ ArurOha|prajABirvRuddhi̍M̍ januṣAmupastha̱m|tABiḥ̍ saṃrabdhO̍ avidathṣaḍurvIḥ|gAtuM prapaśyanniha̍ rAṣṭramAhA̱ḥ||AhAṛṣId-rAṣṭramiha̍ rOhitaḥ|mRudhO̍ vyA̱sthadaBayaM̍ nO astu|4 (10)

asmaByaM̍ dyAvApRuthivI śakvarIBiḥ|rAṣṭraM̍ duhAthAmiha̍ rEvatIBiḥ||vima̍maṛśa̍ rOhitO̍ viśvarUpaḥ|samAcakrAṇaḥ̍ praruhO ruhaśca|diva̍gaMtvAya̍# mahatA mahimnA|vi̍ nO# rAṣṭramunattu̍ payasA̍ svEna||yAstE̍ viśastapasA̍ saMbaBUvuḥ|gAyatraM ~Mvathsamanu tAsta Aguḥ|tAstvA̍ viśantu̍ mahasA̍ svEna|saM̍ mAtA̍ putrO aByEtu̍ rOhitaḥ||5̍ (10)

yUyamugrA̍ marutaḥ pRuśnimAtaraḥ|indrEṇa̍ sayujA pramRuṇItha̍ śatrUn|A̍ vO rOhitO̍ aśRuṇOdaBidyavaḥ|trisaptAsO̍ marutaḥ svAdusaMmudaḥ||rOhitO̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ jajAna|tasmiṅqstantu̍M̍ paramEṣṭhI tatAna|tasmi̍~jCiśriyE̍ aja EkapAt|adRuṃ̍# haddyAvApRuthivI̍ balEna||rOhi̍tO̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ adRuṃhat|tEna̍ suvaḥ̍ staBitaM tEna nAkaḥ|6̍ (10)

sO antarikṣE̍ rajasO̍ vimAnaḥ|tEna̍# dEvAḥ suvaranvavindann||suśEva̍M̍ tvA BAnavO# dIdivAṃsa̱m|samagrAsO̍ juhvO# jAtavEdaḥ|ukṣanti# tvA vAjinamA GRutEna|saṃsa̍magnE̍ yuvasE BOjanAni||agnE̍ śarddha# mahatE sauBagAya|tava̍# dyumnA-nyuttamAni̍# santu|saM jA̱spatyaṃ suyamamAkRuṇuṣva|śatrUyatAmaBiti̍ṣṭhA̍ mahAsi̍ ( )||7 (10) (a- stvEtu rOhitO̍ - nAkO - mahAṃsi)̍ (A2) 2.5.3 upahOmAḥ

punarna̍ indrO# maGavA# dadAtu|dhanAni̍ śakrO Ganyaḥ̍ surAdhA̱ḥ|arvAcInaM̍ kRuṇutAM ~MyAcitO manaḥ|śruṣṭI̍ nO# asya haviṣO# juṣAṇaḥ||yAni# nO jinan dhanAni|jahartha̍# śUra manyunA̱|indrAnuvinda̍ nastAni|anEna̍# haviṣA punaḥ||indra̍ AśA̱Byaḥ pari|sarvAByO&Ba̍yaM̍ karat|8 (10)

jEtA śatrUnq. vicaṛṣaṇiḥ||AkU̱tyai̍ tvA kAmAya̍ tvA samRudhE̱ tvA|purO dadhE̍ amRutatvAya# jIvasE̱||AkUtimasyAva̍sE|kAma̍masya̍ samRuddhyai|indra̍sya̍ yu~jjatE dhiyaḥ||AkU̍tiM̍ dEvIM manasaḥ̍ purO dadhE|yajñasya̍# mAtA suhavA# mE astu|yadicCAmi manasA̍ sakAmaḥ|vidEya̍mEnaddhRuda̍yE̍ niviṣṭam||9̍ (10)

sEdagniragnIṃ ratyE̱tyanyAn|yatra# vAjI tanayO̍ vIḍupAṇiḥ|sahasra̍pAthA̍ akṣarA# samEti||AśA̍nAM̍ tvA &&śApAlEByaḥ|caturByO̍# amRutE̱Byaḥ|idaM BUtasyAddhyakṣEByaḥ|vidhEma̍# haviṣA# vayam||viśvA AśA madhunA̍ saṃsRujAmi|anamIvA̍ Apa OṣadhayO̍ Bavantu|ayaM ~MyajamAnO̍ mRudhO vyasyatAm̍ ( )|10 (10)

agRuBItAḥ̍ paśavaḥ̍ santu sarvE̱||agniḥ sOmO varuṇO̍ mitra indraḥ|bRuhaspati̍ḥ̍ savitA yaḥ sahasrI|pUṣA̍ nO gOBiravasA̍ sarasvatI|tvaṣṭA̍# rUpAṇi samanaktu̍ yajñaiḥ||tvaṣṭA# rUpAṇi dadhatI̍ sarasvatI|pUṣA̍ Bagaṃ# savitA nO# dadAtu|bRuhaspatir-dadadindraḥ̍ sahasra̱m|mitrO dAtA varuṇaḥ̍ sOmO# agniḥ||11 (9) 2.5.4 upahOmAḥ

A nO# Bara Bagamindra̍ dyumanta̱m|ni tE# dEṣṇasya# dhImahi prarEkE|urva iva̍ paprathE kAmO# asmE|tamApRuṇA̍ vasupatE vasUnAm||imaM̍ kAmaM̍ mandayA gOBiraśvai̱ḥ|candravatA̍ rAdhasA̍ paprathaśca|suvaryavO̍# matiBistuByaM ~MviprA̱ḥ|indrAya̍ vAhaḥ̍ kuśikAsO# akrann||indrasya̍ nu vIryAṇi̍ pravOcam|yAni̍# cakAra# prathamAni# vajrI|12 (10)

aha-nnahimanvapastatarda|pra̍ vakṣaṇA# aBinat parvatAnAm||ahannahiM̍ parvatE̍ śiśriyAṇam|tvaṣṭA̱&smai vajraṅ# svaryaM̍ tatakṣa|vAśrA iva̍ dhEnavaḥ syandamAnAḥ|a~jja̍ḥ̍ samudra-mavajagmurApa̍ḥ||vRuṣAyamA̍ṇO&vRuṇIta̍ sOma̱m|trikadrukEṣva-pibath̍ sutasya|A̍ sAyakaM̍ maGavA# datta vajra̱m|ahannEnaM̍ prathamajA mahInAm||13̍ (10)

yadindrAhan-prathamajA̍ mahInAm|AnmAyinAmami̍nAḥ̍ prOta mAyAḥ|Ath sUryaM̍ janayan dyAmuṣAsa̱m|tAdIknA śatrUnna kilAvivithsE||aha̍n̍ vRutraM ~MvRutrataraM̍ ~Mvyaṃsa̱m|indrO vajrEṇa̍ mahatA vadhEna|skandhAṃ̍sIva̍ kuliśEnA̍ vivRukṇA|ahi̍ḥ̍ śayata upapRuk-pRuthivyAm||ayOddhyEva̍ durmada A hi juhvE|mahAvIraM tu# vibAdha-mRujIṣam|14̍ (10)

nAtArIrasya̍ samRutiM̍ ~MvadhAnA̱m|saṃ rujAnA̱ḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ||viśvO̍ vihAyA̍ aratiḥ|vasurdadhE̍ hastE dakṣiṇE|taraṇirna̍ śiśrathat|śravasya̍yA̍ na śiśrathat|viśva̍smA̍ idiṣuddhyasE|dEvatrA̍ havyamUhiṣE|viśva̍smA̍ ithsukRutE vAramRuṇvati|agnir̍ dvArA vyRuṇvati||15̍ (10)

udujjihAnO̍ aBi kAmamIrayann̍|prapRu~jcan̍ viśvA BuvanAni̍ pUrvathA̱|A kEtunA suṣamiddhO̍ yajiṣṭhaḥ|kAma̍M̍ nO agnE aBiharya̍ digByaḥ||juṣAṇO havyamamRutEṣu̍ dUḍhyaḥ|A̍ nO# rayiM bahulA~g̍ gOmatImiṣa̱m|nidhE̍hi̍ yakṣadamRutE̍ṣu̍ BUṣann||aśvi̍nA̍ yajñamAgatam|dAśuṣaḥ̍ purudaṃsasA|pUṣA̍ rakṣatu̍ nO rayim

imaM ~MyajñamaśvinA# varddhayantA|imau̍ rayiM ~MyajamAnAya̍ dhattam|imau paśUn rakṣatAM̍ ~MviśvatO# naḥ|pUṣA naḥ̍ pAtu sadama-prayucCann||pra̍ tE# mahE sarasvati|suBa̍gE̍ vAjinIvati|satyavAcE̍# BarE matim||idaM tE# havyaM GRutavath-sarasvati|satyavAcE̍ praBarEmA̍ havIṃṣi|imAni̍# tE duritA sauBagAni̍ ( )|tEBirvayaṃ̍ suBagAsaḥ̍ syAma||17 (11) (vaj - yrahInA̍ - mRujIṣaM - ~MvyRuṇvati̍ - rakṣatu nO rayiṃ - sauBagAnyEka̍M̍ ca) (A4) 2.5.5 upahOmAḥ

yajñO rAyO yajña IśE̍ vasUnAm|yajñaḥ̍ sasyAnAmuta̍ sukṣitInAm|yajña̍ iṣṭaḥ pUrvacittiM̍ dadhAtu|yajñO brahmaṇvAṃ̍ apyEtu̍ dEvAn||ayaM ~MyajñO varddhatAM̍ gOBiraśvai̱ḥ|iyaM ~MvEdiḥ̍ svapatyA suvIrA̱|idaM barqḥirati# baraḥIṅṣyanyA|imaM ~MyajñaM ~MviśvE# avantu dEvAḥ||Baga# Eva BagavAṃ̍ astu dEvAḥ|tEna# vayaM Bagavantaḥ̍ syAma|18 (10)

taM tvA# Baga sarva ijjOhavImi|sa̍ nO# Baga pura EtA BavEha||Baga̍ praṇEtar̍ Baga satyarAdhaḥ|BagEmAM̍ dhiyamudava̍ dadannaḥ|Baga̍ praṇO# janaya gOBiraśvai̱ḥ|Baga pra nRuBir̍ nRuvantaḥ̍ syAma||śaśvatIḥ̍ samA upayanti̍ lOkAḥ|śaśvatIḥ̍ samA upayantyApa̍ḥ|iṣṭaM̍ pUrtaṃ śaśvatInAṃq̍ samAnAṃ̍ śAśvatEna|haviṣEṣṭvA̍ &nantaM ~MlOkaM paramArurOha||19̍ (10)

iyamEva sA yA prathamA̍ vyaucCat|sA̍ rUpAṇi# kurutE pa~jca# dEvI||dvE svasArau̍ vayatastantramEtat|sanAtanaM̍ ~Mvitataṃq̍ ṣaṇmayUKam|avAnyAṅ̍ stantU̱n kiratO# dhattO anyAn|nAvapRujyAtE̍ na gamAtE̍ anta̱m||A vO# yantUdavAhAsO# adya|vRuṣṭiM ~MyE viśvE# marutO# junanti|ayaM̍ ~MyO agnir marutaḥ̍ samiddhaḥ|EtaM̍ juṣaddhvaM̍ kavayO yuvAnaḥ

dhArAvarA marutO# dhRuṣṇuvOjasaḥ|mRugA̍ na BImAstaviṣEBi̍-rUrmiBi̍ḥ|agnayO̍ na śuśucAnA̍ RujIṣiṇa̍ḥ|BrumiM̍ dhamanta̍ upa gA avRuṇvata||"vica̍kramE{1}",̍ "trirdEvaḥ{2}"||AvEdhasaM nIlapRuṣṭhaM̍ bRuhanta̱m|bRuhaspatiṃq sadanE̍ sAdayaddhvam|sAdadyOniM̍ dama AdIdivAṃsa̱m|hira̍ṇyavarṇamaruṣaṃ̍ sapEma||sa̍ hi śuciḥ̍ śatapatraḥ̍ sa śundhyUḥ|21 (10)

hiraṇyavAśIriṣiraḥ̍ suvara.ṣAḥ|bRuhaspatiḥ̍ sa svAvEśa̍ RuṣvAḥ|pUrU saKiBya̍ A sutiM kariṣṭhaḥ||pUṣaṅqstava̍# vratE vayam|na riṣyEma̍ kadA cana|stOtArasta̍ iha smasi||yAstE̍# pUṣannAvO# antaḥ samudrE|hiraṇyayI̍rantari̍kṣE̍ caranti|yABi̍ryAsi̍ dUtyAṃ sUryasya|kAmE̍na̍ kRutaḥ śrava# icCamAnaḥ||22̍ (10)

araṇyAnyara̍ṇyAnyasau|yA̍ prEva naśyasi|kathA̍ grAmaM na pRucCasi|na̍ tvA BIriva̍ vindatI(3)||vRuṣAravAya vadatE|yadupAva̍ti̍ ciccikaḥ|AGAṭIBiriva̍ dhAvayann|araṇyAnir-ma̍hIyatE||uta̍ gAva# ivAdann|utO vEśmEva̍ dRuśyatE|23 (10)

utO araṇyAniḥ̍ sAyam|śakaṭIriva̍ sarjati||gAma~ggaiṣa Ahvayati|dArva~ggaiṣa̍ upAvadhIt|vasa̍nnaraṇyAnyAṃ̍ sAyam|akrukṣaditi̍# manyatE||na vA araṇyAniṛha̍nti|anyaścEnnABigacCa̍ti|svAdOḥ̍ Palasya̍ jagdhvA|yatra kAmaM nipadyatE̍ ( )||A~jjanagandhIṃ̍ suraBIm|bahvannAmakRuṣIvalAm|prAhaM̍ mRugAṇA̱M mAtara̱m|araṇyAnImaśaṃ-siṣam||24̍ (14) 2.5.6 upahOmAḥ

vArtrahatyAya̍ śavasE|pRutanA-sAhyA̍ya̍ ca|indratvA-&&vartayAmasi||subrahmA̍ṇaM̍ ~MvIravantaM̍ bRuhanta̱m|uruM gaBIraM̍ pRuthubuddhnamindra|śrutaṛṣi̍-mugrama̍Bi-mAtiṣAha̱m|asmaBya̍M̍ citraM ~MvRuṣaṇaṃ̍ rayiM dA̱ḥ||kṣEtriyai tvA niṛRutyai̍ tvA|druhO mu~jcAmi̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśA̱t|anAgasaM brahmaṇE̍ tvA karOmi|25 (10)

śivE tE dyAvApRuthivI̍ uBE imE||śaM tE# agniḥ sahAdBirastu|śaM̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ sahauṣadhIBiḥ|śamantari̍kṣaṃ̍ saha vAtEna̍ tE|śaM tE catasraḥ̍ pradiśO# Bavantu||yA daivIścatasraḥ̍ pradiśaḥ|vAta̍patnIraBi̍ sUryO# vicaṣṭE|tAsA̱M tvA jarasa AdadhAmi|pra̍ yakṣma# Etu niṛRutiM̍ parAcaiḥ||amOci̍ yakṣmA̱d-duritA-davartyai|26̍ (10)

druhaḥ pAśAnniṛRutyai̍ cOdamOci|ahA̍ avartimavi̍dath̍ syOnam|apyaBUd-BadrE̍ sukRutasya̍# lOkE||sUryamRutaM̍ tamasO̍ grAhyA yat|dEvA amu~jca-nnasRu̍janvyE̍nasaḥ|EvamahamimaM̍ kṣE̱triyAjjAmiśaṃqsAt|druhO̍ mu~jcAmi̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśA̱t||bRuhaspatE̍ yuvamindraśca̍ vasvaḥ|divyasyE̍śAthE̍ uta pArthivasya|dhattaṃ̍ rayiṅ stuvatE̍ kIrayE# cit|27 (10)

yUyaM pAta̍ svastiBiḥ sadA# naḥ||dEvAyudhamindramAjOhuvAnAḥ|viśvAvRudha̍maBi̍ yE rakṣamAṇAḥ|yEna̍# hatA dIrGamaddhvAnamAyann̍|anantamarthamani̍varth-syamAnAḥ||yattE̍# sujAtE himavathsu̍ BEṣajam|mayOBUḥ śaMtamA̍ yaddhRudO&si|tatO̍# nO dEhi sIbalE||adO giriByO adhi yat pradhAvasi|saṃqśOBa̍mAnA̍ kanyEva̍ śuBrE|28 (10)

tAM tvA mudgalA̍ haviṣA# varddhayanti|sA naḥ̍ sIbalE rayimABAjayEha||pUrva̍M̍ dEvA aparEṇA-nupaśya~jjanma̍Biḥ|janmAnyava̍raiḥ̍ parAṇi|vEdA̍ni̍ dEvA ayamasmIti mAm|ahaṃ hitvA śarIraM̍ jarasaḥ̍ parastA̱t||prAṇApAnau cakṣuḥ śrOtra̱m|vAcaM manasi̍ saMBRutAm|hitvA̍ śarIraM̍ jarasaḥ̍ parastA̱t|A BUtiM BUtiM̍ ~MvayamaśnavAmahai̍ ( )||imA Eva tA uṣasO yAḥ prathamA̍ vyaucCann|tA̍ dEvyaḥ̍ kurvatE pa~jca# rUpA|śaśvatIrnAva̍pRujyanti|na̍ gamantyanta̱m||29̍ (14) 2.5.7 upahOmAḥ

vasUnAM̍ tvA&&dhItEna|rudrAṇA̍mUrmyA|AdityAnAM̍ tEjasA|viśvE̍ṣAM̍ dEvAnAM kratunA|marutAmEmnA̍# juhOmi svAhA̱||aBiBUti-rahamAga̍mam|indra̍saKA̍ svAyudhaḥ|AsvAśA̍su̍ duṣṣahaḥ||idaM̍ ~MvarcO# agninA# dattamAgA̱t|yaśO Bargaḥ saha OjO balaM̍ ca|30 (10)

dIrGAyutvAya# śataśAradAya|prati̍gRuBṇAmi̍ mahatE vIryAya||Ayu̍rasi̍ viśvAyurasi|sarvAyu̍rasi̍ sarvamAyurasi|sarva̍M̍ ma AyurBUyAt|sarvamAyu̍rgEṣam||BUrBuvaḥ̍ suvaḥ||agnir-dharmE̍ṇAnnAdaḥ|mRutyur-dharmEṇAnna̍patiḥ|brahma̍# kṣatraṅ svAhA̱

prajApatiḥ̍ praṇEtA|bRuhaspatiḥ̍ pura EtA|yamaḥ panthA̱ḥ|candramA̱ḥ punarasuḥ svAhA̱||agnirannAdO&nna̍patiḥ|annAdya̍masmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||sOmO rAjA rAjapatiḥ|rAjyamasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||varuṇaḥ̍ samrAṭ thsamrAṭpatiḥ|sAmrA̱jyamasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱

mitraḥ kṣatraM kṣatrapatiḥ|kṣatramasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||indrO balaM balapatiḥ|bala̍masmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||bRuhaspatir brahma brahmapatiḥ|brahmAsmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||savitA rAṣṭraṃ rAṣṭrapatiḥ|rAṣṭramasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||pUṣA viśAM ~Mviṭpatiḥ|viśa̍masmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱ ( )||sarasvatI̍ puṣṭiḥ puṣṭipatnI|puṣṭi̍masmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱||tvaṣṭA# paśUnAM mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRud-rUpapatiḥ|rUpEṇAsmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ paśUn dadAtu̍ svAhA̱||33 (14) special kOrvai (agniḥ sOmO varuṇO̍ mitra indrO bRuhaspatiḥ̍ savitA pUṣA sarasvatI tvaṣṭA daśa)̍ 2.5.8 upahOmAḥ

sa I̱M pAhi ya RujIṣI̍ tarutraḥ|yaḥ̍ śipravAn̍ vRuṣaBO yO matInAm|yO̍ gO̱traBid-vajraBRudyO̍ hariṣṭhAḥ|sa̍ indra̍ citrAṃ aBitRundhi̍ vAjAn||A̍ tE śuṣmO# vRuṣaBa Etu̍ paścAt|OttarAdadharAgA̍ purastA̱t|A viśvatO# aBi samE̱tvarvA~g|indra# dyumnaṃ suvarvaddhEhyasmE||prOṣva̍smai̍ purOratham|indrAya̍ śUṣamarcata|34̍ (10)

aBIkE# cidu lOkakRut|sa~ggE samathsu# vRutrahA|asmAkaM̍ bOdhi cOditA|naBantA-manyakEṣA̱m|jyAkA̍ adhi dhanvasu||indra̍M̍ ~Mvayaṃ śunAsIra̱m|asmin.̍ yajñE havAmahE|AvAjairupa̍# nO gamat||indrAya̍ śunAsIrAya|srucA̍ juhuta̍ nO haviḥ|35 (10)
